content: उपरागः {@--1@} An eclipse of the sun or moon; उपरागांते शशिनः समुपगता रोहिणी योगं <ls>Ś. 7. 22</ls>; <ls>Śi. 20. 45.</ls> {@--2@} Hence, Rāhu or the ascending node. {@--3@} Redness, red colour, colour; कोपोपरागजनितां <ls>Ratn. 3. 14</ls>; <ls>Mk. 4</ls>; कलहकोप° <ls>Māl. 3.</ls> {@--4@} A calamity, affliction, injury; blighting influence; मृणालिनी हैममिवोपरागं <ls>R. 16. 7.</ls> {@--5@} Misbehaviour, ill conduct. {@--6@} Reproach, blame, abuse.
